4: Math¶

Description¶

Adds or subtracts variable 2 from variable 1.

Arguments¶

Internal¶

  • Function to Perform: The type of the variable to store. Set to 1 to add, or 2 to subtract.

External¶

  • var1: A variable reference Variable to add to or subtract from. This variable will have the final value written to it.
  • var2: A variable reference Variable to add to/subtract from Var1.

Returns¶

  • None
